### Tab 3: Annual Counts By Species

```{r}
salmon <- read.csv(here("data", 
                        "willamette_fish_passage.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

salmon_ts <- salmon %>% 
  mutate(date = mdy(date)) %>% 
  as_tsibble(key = NULL, 
             index = date) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = 3:15, 
               names_to = "species", 
               values_to = "count") %>% 
  filter(species %in% c("coho", 
                        "jack_coho", 
                        "steelhead")) %>% 
  replace_na(list(count = 0))

annual_totals <- salmon_ts %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date), 
         .keep = "unused") %>% 
  select(species, 
         count, 
         year) %>% 
  group_by(year, 
           species) %>% 
  summarize(annual_total = sum(count))
```
